title: Selecting a Factor
description: Factors are the independent variables you are charting that can be either a column of text or number values. In this problem, try out each of the selected factor blocks to see each pie cart that is generated. If you need a reminder of the header names and data, look over the penguins.csv dataset.
hint: Drag in one of the selected factor blocks. This block should be placed after the data frame loads in the data and before the chart object is created from the data frame. Run the program to explore the pie chart. To explore other pie charts, stop the program, delete the selected factor block, and add a different block.
